snippet: West Indies clinched the World Twenty20 title as it defeated host Sri Lanka by 36 runs in the final in Colombo.
abstract: West Indies national cricket teams defeats Sri Lanka by 36 runs to win the World Twenty20 title in Colombo.
lead_paragraph: West Indies clinched the World Twenty20 title as it defeated host Sri Lanka by 36 runs in the final in Colombo.

headline.seo: West Indies Clinch World Twenty20 Cricket Title
headline.main: West Indies Clinch World Twenty20 Cricket Title
